titleStmt.title: Eidyllia in obitum fulgentissimi Henrici Walliæ Principis duodecimi, Romæq[ue] ruentis terroris maximi quo nihil maius meliúsve terris fata donavere, boniq́[ue] divi nec dabunt, quamvis redeant in aurum tempora priscum.
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.
Martin, James, fl. 1615-1630.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
